summary: A nice cavern to call home.
author: Fragginborn

files.name: Dragonborns Antre Final
files.changelogHtml:
Added the final chamber.
Created custom objects for the Pile Room.
Gave cook a bed and dresser.
Tweaks here and there.

files.name: Dragonborns_Antre_101
files.changelogHtml: Fixed up some gaps and exposed texture edges.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 102
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed some light flickering.
Added some more FX.
Took out some lumber I had forgotten to remove.
Fixed a portal bug in the mine.
Fixed mine boss getting stuck on ramp.
Fixed various misalignments.
Evicted one miner due to noise getting into house.
Took out the Nirnroots from the alchemy grow room.
Added leveled encounter in Pile Room.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 110
files.changelogHtml: Fixed a CTD issue caused by using esp file. Switched to using .esm file.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 111
files.changelogHtml: Fixed a CTD issue caused by using esp file. Switched to using an .esp file with the flag set to tell the game that it is an .esm file, until I figure out another way to fix this.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 112
files.changelogHtml: Changed method to use esp file so textures are compressed.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 113
files.changelogHtml:
Reverted to the normal way to use .esp file due to new patch fixing the CTD bug.
Fixed fast travel landing point.
Created a bookshelf in the alchemy room.
Evicted another miner due to noise reaching the house.
Increased light getting inside throne room.
Added more loot here and there.
Added some more FX.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 114
files.changelogHtml:
Added the entrance opening to a new area from the throne room.
Adjusted the lighting a bit in throne room and other areas.
Fixed missing wall section in throne room.
Made other adjustments and tweaks here and there.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
Created a new chamber.
Fixed compass heading.
Addded more FX.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 1_2_1
files.changelogHtml: Added more things to the Haunted area.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 1_2_2
files.changelogHtml:
Added more things to the Haunted area.
Fixed some texture misalignments.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 2
files.changelogHtml:
Created interior of haunted house.
Created mini quest for haunted house.
Fixed some texture misalignments.
Adjusted some lighting (lightened).
Finished the exit (it\'s caved in right now) at the haunted house that will lead to a new mod I\'m working on.

files.name: Dragonborns Antre 2_2
files.changelogHtml:
Optimized opening scene in haunted house.
Stopped light flicker in haunted house.
Added some FX to the outside of the haunted house.
